content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[CheckMetatableAvailabeSP] AS
BEGIN

 DECLARE @totalCount int,
         @availableCount int;

 BEGIN TRY
    SET @totalCount = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[metatable])

    SET @availableCount = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[metatable] WHERE changed = 'available')

    IF @availableCount = @totalCount
        BEGIN
        SELECT 1 AS Status;
        END
    ELSE
        BEGIN
            SELECT 0 AS Status;
        END

        --Other Way

    -- IF EXIST(Select * from [dbo].[metatable] Where changed <> 'available' )
    --     BEGIN
    --         Select 0 as Status
    --     END

    -- ELSE
    --     BEGIN
    --         Select 1 as Status
    --     END

 END TRY

 BEGIN CATCH

 END CATCH

END
GO
